pr_title: MULE-18051: Improve SDK performance by using generated bytecode instead of reflection

timeline.message: MULE-18051: Improve SDK performance by using generated bytecode instead of reflection

timeline.author: elrodro83

timeline.bodyText: this is true also for MuleException. Did you make it a MuleRuntimeException because of this or do you actually need this to be a runtime exception?

+
+import java.io.File;
+
+/**
+ * Represents a class that was dynamically generated at runtime

+ * @param <T> the generic type of the generated class
+ * @since 4.3.0
+ */
+public final class GeneratedClass<T> {
+
+  private final Class<T> generatedClass;
+  private final File byteCodeFile;

replies.bodyText: The underlying classloader is an URLClassLoader. How can you load the class otherwise?
